Package org.neo4j.internal.id

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChunkConsumer
    Delayed buffer chunk consumer
    FreeIds
    Accessor/stream of free ids, for rebuild purposes.
    IdController
    Represent abstraction that responsible for any id related operations on a storage engine level: buffering, maintenance, clearing, resetting, generation.
    IdController.ConditionSnapshot
    Essentially a snapshot of whatever data this IdController needs to decide whether or not a batch of ids can be released, in maintenance.
    IdGenerator  
    IdGenerator.Marker  
    IdGeneratorFactory  
    IdSequence  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchingIdSequence
    IdSequence w/o any synchronization, purely a long incrementing.
    BufferedIdController
    Storage id controller that provide buffering possibilities to be able so safely free and reuse ids.
    BufferingIdGenerator  
    BufferingIdGeneratorFactory
    Wraps IdGenerator so that ids can be freed using reuse marker at safe points in time, after all transactions which were active at the time of freeing, have been closed.
    DefaultIdController
    Default implementation of IdController.
    DefaultIdGeneratorFactory  
    DelayedBuffer<T>
    Buffer of long values which can be held until a safe threshold is crossed, at which point they are released onto a Consumer.
    DelayedBuffer.Chunk<T>  
    IdGenerator.Delegate  
    IdRange  
    IdRangeIterator  
    IdValidator
    Utility containing methods to validate ids generated by IdGenerator.
    ReadOnlyHighIdGenerator
    An IdGenerator that knows only about a highId and is read-only
    ScanOnOpenOverwritingIdGeneratorFactory
    A DefaultIdGeneratorFactory that ignores any existing id file on open and instead replaces it with an id file of the current format with the highId it got from scanning the store on open.
    ScanOnOpenReadOnlyIdGeneratorFactory
    IdGeneratorFactory that ignores the underlying id file and only uses the provided highIdScanner in IdGeneratorFactory.open(PageCache, Path, IdType, LongSupplier, long, boolean, PageCursorTracer, ImmutableSet), instantiating IdGenerator that will return that highId and do nothing else.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IdType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IdCapacityExceededException  
    InvalidIdGeneratorException  
    NegativeIdException  
    ReservedIdException
